attributes.action: Get rid of this crippling rain Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a sme based in the west midlands.in the post this morning we received a bill for the above mentioned tax for £8707.35 going back six years. why when we are struggling in this economic are you allowing this

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
